channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 1,600 gallons of firefighting chemicals containing PFAS are released in Maine
item.description: Officials say a malfunctioning fire suppression system at the former Brunswick Naval Air Station released about 1,600 gallons of firefighting foam containing dangerous per-and polyfluoroalkyl chemicals.

item.title: Haitian ex-President Martelly hit with U.S. sanctions, accused of facilitating drug trade
item.description: The U.S. has imposed sanctions on the former president of Haiti, Michel Joseph Martelly, following accusations that he abused his influence to facilitate drug trafficking into the U.S. and sponsored gangs that have contributed to instability in the Caribbean country.

item.title: South Carolina sheriff who told deputy to shock inmate is found not guilty in civil rights case
item.description: A jury has found a sheriff in South Carolina not guilty of violating a jail inmateâ€™s civil rights when he ordered a deputy to shock the man several times with a Taser.
